tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Bone Grafting for Dental Implants,Zirconia Crowns,Braces,
review:
I consulted Dr.Amruta and Dr.Rabab at Ivory Smiles for a long term and important treatment involving Bone Grafting, Implantation, Crown and Alignment. I am delighted by the entire process and outcome of my treatment.
They thoroughly diagnosed and recommended necessary treatments and made sure I understood every step involved. And both the doctors had a perfect coordination in the treatment plan. Considering the usual discomfort in dental procedures, my experience was surprisingly comfortable. Timeline of the treatment was also communicated beforehand and things were on track. The support staff and scheduling of consultation is very good so I never had to wait overtime. The treatments were not be the most affordable considering the complexity, but they are definitely fair valued given the quality and expertise provided.
reply_text: Thank you so much for the kind feedback!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Veneers / Laminates,Invisalign Orthodontics,Dental Cavity Filling,
review:
Teeth related issues always are scary and need to handled with utmost care,  thus choosing a right dentist is an uphill climb.. I would just say that i got lucky to meet Dr. Amruta, when she used to work in a different clinic before she opened Ivory Smiles. I have ever since then, been hooked to her for anything (small / big) related to teeth :).. not just me but my whole family - my parents, my husband and now my daughter & my friends. When you meet her aswell, you just know you have come to the right place!! Always a smile on her face and not to forget, she ensures all in her clinic treat patients with a lot of respect.

A few reasons why we all go back to Ivory Smiles and would choose to that even if we have travel a great deal of distance: 

1. First & foremost, Dr. Amruta and her team - extremely knowledgeable and great at their skill!
2. Politeness of her staff and all in the clinic. Treat you with great care and respect.
3. Hygiene & cleanliness at a 100% satisfaction level. Proper sanitization always.. 
4. Instruments & machines used for treatments are visibly high quality and thus the fees they charged is extremely reasonable for what you get in return!
5. Best quality Implants (no compromise whatsoever on quality)
6. High on Ethics & completely Transparent, starting from the word 'GO'.. you will not have to ask and if you do, they will patiently provide you all answers to all your questions.

A major reason for my confidence and blind faith on her - almost a decade back, had visited a known dentist for getting my teeth evaluated and the doctor got me super worried by saying i had 8 cavities which needed immediate remediation to avoid further decay...that's when i went for a second opinion, where I met Dr. Amruta and the rest is history... She thoroughly checked, and told me there were none.. its been almost 10 years and its now that ive undergone a filling for 1 tooth.. again painless treatment..my parents & my husband have gone through multiple RCTs and implants and all treatments have been to a 100% satisfaction...

Thank you soo much Dr. Amruta and team for doing such an amazing job!!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Almost an year back, I've been referred to Dr. Amruta by a friend (one of her patient). I've a history of RCTs over last 15 years with treatment from 3 different locations across India.

Always skeptical about the dentist, quality of treatment and price being charged. 

My case:- I had 3 critical problems i.e. RCTs, Wisdom Tooth Extraction and Implant. Over last 1 year, Dr. Amruta and her team of Specialist has completed these procedures with best quality treatment and utmost patience.  

Root Canal Treatments - got completed 4 months back,10/10 

1. Regular X-Ray Scans & follow-ups with whatsapp, SMS and email based reminders 
2. Proper Treatment & explanation of the procedure 
3. <5 mins of waiting 
4. ZERO PAIN, most important  
5. Best Quality fillings & Crowns (almost 4+ months now, no issue)

WT Extraction - Completed, 10/10

1. No PAIN during the procedure (complete care) 
2. Proper Care and instructions post procedure 
3. 10/10 for Hygiene  

Tooth Implant - Completed, 10/10 

1. No Pain & superb EYE for detail
2. Very good quality implant and crown on top of it 
3. Complete care during and after the procedure 
4. Regular follow-up by Dr. Amruta
5. It's just like my normal tooth

Safety measure during COVID - 10/10

1. Complete Sanitization of the chair and tools after every procedure 
2. All Doctors and staff - Always in PPE Suits 
3. High Quality measures by the team amid COVID i.e. surface sanitization, thermal scanning and contactless payments - I felt extremely safe!

Thanks Dr. Amruta and team for the treatment.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
context: Smile Design,Dental Implant Fixing,Straightening of teeth ( Invisalign ) - Removable option,
review: ** **** ****** ****** * **** **** *** I visited ivory smiles dental clinic almost 9 months ago for smile correction.I had some missing teeth since my previous dentist never thought of trying to save it. I met Dr Amruta and after my initial consultation i was sure about the decision I made to visit her. She listened to all my needs and I had very less time in hand to get all my treatments sorted. She suggested invisalign treatment to get my teeth aligned as I had very bunched up teeth and then we did a couple of dental implants nobel biocare and veneers.now I have a smile that I longed for all my life.Dr Prahalad was my invisalign specialist and both Dr Prahalad and Dr Amruta took so much of keen interest In my smile.they follow the word perfection to the T.never  thought so so much advancement exists in dentistry**** ** **** *************** Dr Amruta  also makes sure that all her patients (I have seen her treating other patients too) are comfortable and treatments are as painless as possible.Now I have moved away from Bangalore and I visit her every time I visit Bangalore. She always accommodates her schedule for me(trust me she is busy   but does not make us wait a bit).she has become like a friend now and I thank her for the beautiful smile she has given me. Do visit her and Dr prahalad for any smile correction issues

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited Ivory Smiles Dental Clinic for the treatment of Gum disease and I’m writing this feedback after multiple visits in last 2 months !!
I visited Dr.Amruta at the stage were my Gums are in red in color and about to bleed and I can’t even able to bare the pain of drinking water touches my left gum and now I started eating both the sides.
Dr.Amruta is very Punctual and friendly in nature and very approachable and takes good care of her patients always with a smile and never made me to feel like she is giving less importance !!
She clearly explained problem I had and make me understood how severe it is and she explained about the laser treatment and treatment plan.Recommended to start the treatment without delaying as the delay in treatment leads my problem to much severe condition !!
I’m impressed with her treatment the way she explained the process before and while doing treatment!!  Background music was really awesome!!
Finally I’m happy with the result and now I can eat both the sides of  my teeth as earlier !!
Final thing to say, we are in a world as most of the doctors wash their hand after treatment ,But Dr.Amruta is totally different from others and she was very happy after seeing my improvements in Gum after her treatment.That was really impressive.
Unquestionably,,I’ll recommend to everyone *** ** ********* *** * **** ******* ***As you explained I will soon visit Ivory smiles for Teeth alignment!!
Over all im very happy and great thanks to you Mam to make me to come out from my Gum disease !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited this clinic almost 6 months back and today the treatment were completed. I am so happy with my smile and I keep taking so many pictures too. I got Invisalign from Dr Raba and after getting my bite and alignent corrected I got venners done by Dr Amruta. The treatments were planned very nicely and i must say the communication is crystal clear with all doctors. They have excellant materials and I got fillings done and they lasted very well. Thank you to Dr Amruta for all the dental work. Highly highly recommend

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Veneers / Laminates,Ceramic Dental Braces,
review: I had initially gone to the doctor to get my teeth in shape as I never wore braces in my childhood and was now facing problems with their crookedness. Dr. Amrita and Dr. Vivek were both fantastic - their recommendations, timelines, professionalism and expertise were top notch. In fact when I found out that I had to move abroad on a short notice,  they expedited my timelines for the orthodontic procedures from 1 year to 6 months! Changed their approach quickly, performed the relevant procedures for the same and even though I was skeptical initially since moving teeth is a slow process I was just amazed at the results in the end. And post the brace work, I had veneers applied which have just been perfect, Dr. Amruta was super efficient and all her recommendations were spot on. I would highly recommend Dr. Amruta for all dental problems. She's very pragmatic and honest, so you will definitely not be misled but get the best possible solutions for your problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Implant Fixing,Bone Grafting for Dental Implants,Dental Fillings, Teeth cleaning & polishing,
review:
I have had 4 dental implants placed in this clinic by Dr Amruta 4-5 months back. The entire process was painless and I was quite happy with the clean n hassle free way in which she works. Absolutely no pain or discomfort. Dr Amruta and her team are wonderful people and I would really recommend her for any major procedures. 
Dr Vinitha also handled some fillings and they were also done painlessly. Thank you to Pradeep the front desk guy for timely reminders n friendly smiles whenever I visit them. A must visit if you are looking for a good dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** **** * **** **** ** **** I know her for the past few years and seeking major treatments from her. Her diagnosis is impeccable and whatever she says feels so logical and scientific. I had tmj issue for many years and some missing teeeth. Been suffering since my jaws would get locked when I yawn. After showing to dentists in Delhi, Chandigarh n Chennai, I travelled to Bangalore to see her and she gave me the right diagnosis. I have completed my Invisalign with her and now I can feel the difference. No more clicking sounds and jaw pains since 2 yrs. My smile improved so much. So happy that I can live a comfortable pain free life now. Visit her and see the difference. Changes are not high but I feel rightly priced too. Not too low not too expensive. She clearly tells the pros n cons so we know money is well invested. Thank you Dr Amruta. I hope this review helps people make the right decision about choosing the best dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Ceramic Veneers / Crowns ,Dental Deep Cleaning,
review: Like most of you I visited this clinic based on the ratings. But after finishing my dental work with Dr Amruta and her team I am very confident that she will be my permanent dentist. The treatments are planned very well and everything is done keeping long term life of the teeth In mind. The prices might just be a few hundred rupees more but the clinic is clean and instruments come in clean packages so one is really assured that the hygiene is taken care of. I got couple of root canals done, crowns veneers and a deep clean for my bleeding gums. So happy with the services and big thanks to Dr Amruta ma’am n her team. Dr Nandini also did a great job. Thank you once again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Amruta is such a sweet and humble person. Her clinic is located in a prime place and very accessible to where we stay(Harlur road)I got to know about her from a friends in laws who have been taking her treatment for many years. I got 5 crowns done and 3 root canals. Also got extraction done of a very tough wisdom tooth by Dr Bipin who is the surgeon there. Dr Amruta’s hand skills are very good and she swiftly works and you can see her calm n composed. Her assistants are so well trained that they know what she needs. That is how I know she is brilliant cos her support staff work like her. As patients we generally neglect dental health and we only visit when there is an issue. But she will tell you what needs immediate care and what treatment can wait. She is not behind money at all. She cares about quality of work. That is what we want from dentists right. Overall treatments are **** *** painless. Highly recommend her…

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Amruta and her team are thorough professionals and the best at what they do. My first visit here she clearly explained what the issue was and what needed to be done to correct it, reassuring a paranoid me that all would be fine. Before visiting Ivory Smiles I was anxious about getting any kind of dental procedure done. But I have to say that my experience here was a breeze. Had scaling done and 3 wisdom teeth extracted with hardly any pain. Ivory Smiles should be at the top of your list if you’re looking for (almost) pain free dentistry.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Dental Cavities,Teeth Whitening,
review: Ivory smiles is a place where perfection, professionalism and punctuality meet. The clinic is clean and spotless. *** ***** *** ********* *** ********* *** ******** **** *** ********* *** Dr. Amruta makes sure to explain the problem, and possible treatments clearly. My overall experience with appointments, timely reminders, and treatment of dental issues have been seamless. The dentists here are very professional and good with what they do. My RCT was done perfectly, without any issues, and the crown following that is just perfect. An excellent dental center to opt for.

This is one of the most happy, feel good clinics you ever come across. Dr Amruta is very friendly, responsive and excellent at her work. I haven't seen any other clinic in India so clean and operating with such a minimalistic design. We went through multiple procedures over last few months and looked forward to meet Dr Amruta everytime. She is a happy jolly positive person and makes you at ease effortlessly. She has gone extra miles in helping with documents post treatment also. 

Bonus: her clinic also has a great non-intrusive music playing in the background that tells about the taste.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Bone Grafting for Dental Implants,Microscope Assisted Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,
review: Been visiting this clinic for most of my dental procedures and would highly recommend Dr Amruta if you want the best. She goes an extra mile to make sure she gives the best treatment to all her patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Bone Grafting for Dental Implants,Dental Implant Fixing,
review: My experience was wonderful. The whole procedure was explained very well and executed with ease. I really liked Dr Amruta as her treatments were painless. The way she did the implant procedure was so smooth and what I really liked is she would keep taking dental x rays in between and checking her work. That is a good sign of a brilliant surgeon. I have been so many dentists since many years as I have lot of issues but I found this clinic to be the best. Not changing my dentist again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I took my mom to Dr Amruta as my mother had some
Missing teeth. On x rays and she found the permanent tooth still inside the bone and did not suggest unnecessary treatments. My mom is very happy because no other doctor found the real situation. She is very polite doctor and we recommend her to our friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thank you doctor for the smile correction. I got my ceramic braces removed today and I can see the difference in my eating and my smile. Super happy with results. I feel glad I choose a good place for my dental correction. Highly recommend Dr Amruta and Dr Paramita

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Had a round of smile designing done. Had 4 veneers  done to mask discolouration n an old crowns which was badly looking. So happy with the results. Dr Amruta has magic in her hands. My friends can’t identify my teeth from my veneers which is the best feeling. Thank u so much Dr Amrita

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very happy with the treatments. Had a full smile designing done and dental veneers done. Also had some re root canals done and the treatments were executed very well. Thanks to dr jeyandranath and dr Amruta for all the efforts they took for my smile. Highly recommended

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Cosmetic Filling,Gum Disease Treatment/ Surgery,
review: ** ******* ** **** **** ******* I used to go to my old doctor in another city but then after moving to Bangalore I was looking for a good doctor. Her clinic is very up to date and the treatments are good.. unnecessary treatments are not suggested. Pros n cons of everything explained well. Coming to execution of work 20/10. They spend enough time to educate patients about the problem. I had multiple sittings and every sitting was painless. I am so happy to come here. Thank you doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Ivory dental clinic for RCT and my experience was really great during the complete process. Doctors are really good and polite and let you know the problem and how they gonna do the treatment. Proper precautions are taken so that patients are safe (COVID time)
Higly recommend to everyone for dental related issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Sensitive Teeth,Dental Cavities,Dental Crowns,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,
review: Have been visiting Ivory Dental for about 9 months now for Root Canal treatments, Dental Fillings, Crown setting etc. and not even for once have I regretted by decision to choose Dr.Amrutha and Dr. Jay for the work. extremely professional and jovial. these doctors will ensure you go back home smiling as you were before the treatment. Highly recommend them when it comes to any dental related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: The clinic was very clean and well sanitized. The treatment procedure was perfect and doctors were friendly and supportive throughout the process. Also,I would say they are experts in dentistry. I would recommend anybody who has dental issues tl go to Ivory Smiles Dental Clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ** ***  **** ****** ****** *** **** ** **** ******* ********* ***** I visited Ivory Smile dental clinic for RC treatment and I am so happy with the service they provided.Dr Amruta is very friendly and comforting 
My procedure went with very ease without pain .Would highly recommend this for any dental consultation and issues. 🙂🙂

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Dental Checkup (General),
review: Dr.Amrutha and her team is fantastic! I've always been the type of person terrified of going to the dentist due to painful past experiences. After getting 2 root canal and 3 fillings, she has for sure changed my feeling about going to a dentist. Not only was the work awesome the staff was also amazing ! Thank you guys !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Full Mouth Rehabilitation,Surgical Extractions of Teeth,Dental Implant,
review: I am truely happy with the care and help I had from Dr Amruta for my multiple implant procedures. Best doctor I have met. She explains things so calmly and I had 5 implants and it was so smooth. She even explained me not to hurry up and do all the implants at once so that I am able to eat well. I was really touched with the amount of care she takes for all her patients. Treatment did not pain more than 1 day. I travel from another city to bangalore to get procedure done after reading her reviews and so happy now with the final result. Thank you to her entire team who are wonderful as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited Dr Amruta from a referral of a friend family who have been getting treated by her for many years. Initially I was very skeptical but after meeting her and after completion of my treatment I have full confidence on her and Ivorysmiles. I got 3 root canals and 4 crowns done. They plan the treatment very well which I think is lacking in most dentists. They give a complete picture of dental issues and what are the steps required. They are so clear in what they explain and treatment is also done according. I had really bad experiences with other dentists but after meeting her I have decided not to change my dentist for ever. She is very sweet humble and the people in her clinic are also very nice. Not behind money at all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Aesthetic Dentistry,Invisible/Clear Braces,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Smile Design,Veneers / Laminates,
review: I got to know about Ivory Smiles Dental Clinic from Practo and I went there with multiple dental issues like tooth alignment and extraction, smile correction along with a strict deadline on top of all. Even though we couldn’t meet the deadline because of the lockdown but Dr. Amruta tried her best to minimise the effect of the lockdown on my treatment and it all turned out perfect. Dr. Amruta and her whole team is super friendly, understanding and very approachable. I am very happy with the results of my treatment and I strongly recommend Ivory Smiles Dental Clinic because when you are going for such a big change which will be there on your face for all your life, you need a doctor like Amruta. :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Well! I was having tooth sensitivity from a very long time and I had to show it to the dentist, and I bumped into ivory smiles dental clinic in hsr layout. I was introduced to Dr. Amruta who studied my tooth and advised me that I would have to go through a root cannal treatment. I was nervous on the day of the treatment but the doctor was very calm and did the over all root cannal treatment very smoothly without any pain. The entire process was of no pain which every one are worried when they go through the root cannal treatment. I really trust Dr Amruta and will be visiting her for any tooth pain or general appointment
Dr. Amruta is very polite, courteous & transparent in her approach. She covered all the minute details while explaining the treatment plan.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review: I had a wonderful experience at this clinic. I stay in WHITEfield and used to go 20 kms away to a dentist who a family friend recommended. But I am so glad I found a great dentist like Dr Amruta close to my house. The clinic is upto date with latest developments and all her treatments are very well planned. Her consultants are amazing as well. I would highly recommend this clinic for any dental procedure. All the best to the team

review: I had a wonderful experience here and I would highly recommended this place. Dr Amruta is a perfectionist and you can see the passion towards her work. Her staff are really professional and the entire place is so clean. Best dental clinic in town for any dental procedure. Also my son was getting treated here and the experience has been wonderful too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.  Amruta Dash is incredible. I really impressed with the way she explained treatment options for my tooth problem on day one. On every appointment she  explained healing progress by showing xray and scan. For the entire 4 months implant treatment, i never feel uncomfortable. It’s rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient as a person with outstanding quality of treatment. I highly recommend this doctor and clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I just got my dental implant done today. Dr Amruta plans all treatments very meticulously and suggests what's best for you. Prices are also reasonable compared to many clinics in the city. I had two implants placed and I had pain for just a day. Highly recommended for any major procedure.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review: If you people wanna have a satisfication in the treatment you undergo, visit ivory smiles without any second thoughts. Highly recommended. Extremely friendly, clear explanation of what we have and what to expect throughout the process. The background songs are trendy and catchy which makes you much more comfortable with the process. These people are the best dental specialists I have seen so far and gonna stick to them forever.

review: Got some root canals done and fillings. Everything was done very meticulously end all staff following COVID protocols. They are not very expensive neither do they do treatments at low prices. I feel dental treatments need to be done nicely for it to last longer. The clinic used all high end instruments and very clean and neat. Everything is sterilised well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
